title: ğŸ“‚âœğŸ—‘ï¸ğŸ˜” Delete Individual Files
content:
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/judigot/<repositoryName>
git pull origin <branch>
git rm file.txt
git commit -m "Delete"
git push -f origin <branch>
git status

title: ğŸ“‚ğŸ“‚ğŸ“‚ğŸ“‚âœğŸ—‘ï¸ğŸ˜¢ Delete All Files
content:
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/judigot/<repositoryName>
git pull origin <branch>
git rm -r *
git commit -m "Delete"
git push -f origin <branch>
git status
